name: Cavern Heroes
description:
2D Fantasy Platformer

Controls: 

Shift - Change Character

Movement

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

S - Guard

Attack

Right-Click -  Primary attack

E - Ranged attack

Q  - Ultimate

Others

"1" - Restart

Esc - Pause

NOTE

Some attacks are dependent on mouse position so be aware of its uses

Context:

My first ever game but i took way too long to make this game. Unpolished game.  No UI ,messy ingame code,awkward camera positions. Only one level with a few bosses. Want feedback on the gameplay to see if i should continue it or not. else, i will make new projects. It would help me a lot on my progress and passion on game dev to see if i should continue or not.

Setting:

A disturbance was felt in the great caverns in the kingdom of Heroma. 3 heroes, The Knight, The Wizard and The Necromancer set off to fight and eliminate all threats that reside in the caverns. Hope they may return to their homes alive...

Objective (as of now):

Reach the End Altar

OR

Kill One Boss

(There are 3 boss portal hidden around the map)

Locations:

Area after circulating platforms

Area under 3 falling stones

Area above water zone
